eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: The landship's arrival calms the unrest on the plate—though Jessica still appears saddled with worries—and also indicates that the situation is now completely unsalvageable as the locals turn increasingly passive.

attributes.content: ...Two people died during the unrest, four are seriously wounded, dozens more have lighter injuries, thirteen shops and homes were looted, and small fires broke out in parts of main street.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: Fortunately, our squads managed to quickly bring the situation under control.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: Currently, we have mercenary teams stationed in the plate's most important facilities and main roads, to maintain public security and order.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: Should I stop my report?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: Let's pause here for now.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Then if you'll excuse me. I'll come back in once you're done with your call.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: No need. You can listen in.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Apologies for calling this late, Mr. Cliff. We've put the reserve funds in storage, and I'd like to thank everyone for escorting them all this way.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: No need to thank us for fulfilling our contract. Also, I'd rather discuss what comes next—the towing—in person.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: When will you be free? Tomorrow at noon?
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: Sure, I'll have my secretary arrange it.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: I'd also like to ask another question, if you don't mind.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: I'm wondering... how do you plan to handle the townsfolk who participated in last night's unrest?
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: We've detained the ones we caught on the landship for the time being, and we're currently tracking down the rest.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Tsk... Those thugs were already giving us a headache. They're in dire straits financially, and now they've turned to robbing others.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: You sound pretty familiar with them.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Yes, they're all old acquaintances on the bank's debtor list.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: Mind if we take a look at that?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Of course not. If you're going to look into the matter, you should start with these people.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: Thanks for bringing him over last night, Jessica.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Is Leone alright? Benny's gone, and then his house, the only thing he had left, burned down in that fire. He...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: He didn't say anything... Fell asleep as soon as I treated his wounds.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: He's lucky he spends his nights getting wasted on the streets instead of sleeping in bed.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: That's enough out of you, Woody.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Fine, I'll go check on him.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Jessica... weren't you outside welcoming the landship yesterday? Why'd you come back all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Actually, Woodrow... I was looking for you, but I saw smoke coming from Leone's house, so I went there first.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: For me? What for?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Ever since I got here... I've been worrying nonstop about the landship's arrival.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But that's your company. Ain't it a good thing? Now you've got an entire fortress of your buddies to take over any problems y'all have been facing.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: But... that doesn't mean Blacksteel being here will be good for the people of the plate.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Nomadic platforms are expensive to build and an extremely scarce resource, so the government won't just discard them. They'll probably refurbish the plate, upgrading it and integrating it into a larger settlement.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Still not seeing the downside.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: But they don't want the residents to stay, so they're doing everything they can to make them leave on their own...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's why the bank's here.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: They've recovered a lot of the fallen platform's assets through loan contracts and risky ventures, and they've sent a lot of people to the frontier too.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Methods like these are perfectly legal... there's nothing for us to object to.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Are the people really gonna take it though?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Maybe they don't have a choice...? You've been here a lot longer than I have, so I'm sure you know better than I do.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Heh, we still have a few tough nuts to crack.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...Which is why they've engaged a mercenary group like Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And what about after your undoubtedly thorough investigation? Do you plan to keep the detainees at Fort Barron?
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: I may as well ask how you've dealt with them in the past.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: We used to ship guys like them off to the frontier, when we still had police.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: Then we'll do the same.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Thank you for doing all this for us.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: It's no big deal. Looking forward to our meeting tomorrow.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Hold on. Could I make a small request? Could we have additional security deployed at the bank?
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: No problem. I'll have my subordinates make any further arrangements.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Right. See you tomorrow then.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: What do you think, Tila?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: That we're getting our hands dirty again.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: What else can they do? They're all respectable people who can't sully their reputations. So it's up to us mercs to be the bad guys.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: So how should we handle that last request from the bank?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: Did they suffer any damage last night?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Just some obscene graffiti scrawled all over the building.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: Whatever... Emotional damage counts as damage too. Just dispatch some people familiar with the situation.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: The important thing for now is to figure out how to clear all these irrelevants off the board before the plate starts moving.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: So... your landship ain't here just to tow the plate away, is it?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Helping the bank evict debtors and recover non-performing assets are both on the to-do list.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: As for the methods... I don't think they'll leave any room for concessions.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...And what do you want me to do about it?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Before I came here, someone asked me to bring a bullet to you.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A bullet?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...Who?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: My boss, 'Clip' Cliff.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And who's that?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: When I was looking for you that day, there was an open drawer with a photo inside. Cliff is the man who had his arm around your shoulder.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...So he changed his name. Huh. And now he's your boss.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: I'm so sorry, I didn't mean to look.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But if you have a history with each other, then maybe you could have a word with him? I don't know...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: If there's anyone he'd listen to, it's you, right? I really don't have any other ideas...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica, I appreciate you helping out Leone, Helena, and who knows who else. But I just can't wrap my head around why you're being so stubborn about this.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: You're a merc. You've got no duty to us. You don't have to stick your nose into every little thing you see.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Back in Victoria, I... sat back and just let things happen. And it ended horribly...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It was all my fault.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Thanks for bringing me the bullet. I've been looking for it for a long, long time now.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: You should get back to your friends first. Some things, all I can do is give it my best shot.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Woody—!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: The bed's empty, Woody! Did Leone go out?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I ran into him this morning. He's off looking for Miles.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Then why didn't you tell me earlier—
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Let's just say... I forgot.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Come again?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: My apologies, sir, but this place has been sealed off and no one's allowed in or out.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: What do you mean no one's allowed in or out? I spent half my life here! Let me through!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I'm sorry, sir.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Hey, wait—what are you doing to me?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: This...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Please forgive me, sir. But this is my job.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Get your ass back here—
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Miles? I was just about to go in there looking for you! You alright after that huge mess last night?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I'm good, but... what's with the huge wound on your head?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: I ran into that gang of troublemakers yesterday, and... we exchanged a few blows. Why aren't you in the tower?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Those people barged in here after things quieted down. Said Blacksteel would be taking over the maintenance work and 'kindly escorted' me out.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: They do anything to you?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: (Glances at the mercenary standing guard) No...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Let's get out of here first. Not exactly the best place to talk.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Leave the door open, Leone. We have to get back to the plant later.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: How can anyone get in there with their eyes all over the place?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I know an abandoned path into the tower, hasn't been used in years.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Then let's get going.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: What's the rush? I need to fetch some tools to clear the road, among other things...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Need any help?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Don't bother, I got everything here. Let's go.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: There's so much dust here. Just how long has this path been here?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Has to be at least thirty years since anyone last came through here... *cough* *cough*
attributes.name: Miles
Laura
attributes.content: Who's there? You already called me over, there's no need to send an escort—

attributes.name: Laura
attributes.content: Huh, Miles and Leone? What are you guys doing here? How'd you get them to let you in?
Shh. Keep it down, Laura. We just wanna take a look around. Won't be long.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Fine... I'll let you know if the patrol comes around, but keep it quick.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: ...Lucky we ran into her, and not anyone else.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: What are you doing? There's already fuel in there, so why throw in more stuff to burn?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Remember what happened in July? So many people finally caved in and signed agreements to go to the frontier.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: ...How could I forget?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Well, the bank's been putting on the pressure again, and this time there's even more people talking about it.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: I asked a few families and some of 'em are already waiting for the frontier convoys. Others still want to hold out here, but... how long can they keep it up?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Just get to the point, Miles.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: ...I'm planning to leave too. No one needs the Davistown mine no more. Even if they fix up the plate, no one's gonna care about us miners. Without jobs, we'll all end up leaving in disgrace anyhow.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: So, y'know... Come with me, Leone.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Maybe you're right, but I still ain't leaving.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: ...Yup, that's the Leone I know.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: So is that why you wanted to come here? Just to tell me that?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: No, I came because I wanted to... burn what needs burning, I guess. Before I leave.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Wait, but there's so many photos of people in that album. You plan on burning all those too?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I ain't like you, Leone. I don't wanna spend the rest of my life here.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: I figured you were just dead-drunk when you said that last time...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I had a notion of leaving this town even when I was young, but no way my parents could take care of all my younger siblings on their own. That's how I ended up stumbling into the mines in a stupor when I was fifteen.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: My eyes were scorched by the heat and sweat of the boiler room, while the older guys bossed me around. I hated every goddamn minute of it, but could only press on through clenched teeth while thinking about my family.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: And by the time I realized it, all I knew was taking care of the furnace. Didn't know any other way to live.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: You never told me all this...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone. It hurt when Benny said he was leaving, but even then I felt he made the right choice.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: So this has been a long time coming?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Yeah. Let him go before this plate ties him down. Maybe he can go to college. Ironforge City, Trimounts... anywhere's fine as long as it ain't here.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: So you're saying I should be glad he got out in time?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: This land here's been squeezed dry, Leone. And those guys from the government are just gonna abandon it entirely, or scoop in new soil from elsewhere...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: To them, we're just old straw refusing to rot away. Nothing but trouble.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: ...Wait, what's that?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Why's there a photo of your family in there—
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Leone reflexively moves to stick his hand into the furnace, but the photo vanishes in a puff of blue smoke before he can even feel the heat.
Benny must've left that one in. I wasn't too careful when packing it all up, sorry.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: It's fine. Don't know why I wanted to grab it in the first place. Wonder how long it'll take these blisters to heal without treatment or medicine.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: The flames in the furnace blaze brightly, and a few sparks sputter from within. They cool in the air and turn into smattering specks of gray, falling onto the man's shoes.
He sighs as he rubs the corners of his eyes, only to realize that the wetness that had been there has already dried up from the high temperature.
Sir, this must be a misunderstanding. I stayed home all night yesterday!
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: Please cooperate with us, ma'am.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Sir, please! Can't you talk your superiors into being a little flexible? How can I leave for the frontier mid-winter with a child in tow?!
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: It seems you do know where we're taking you. So please, just cooperate. We don't want to have to resort to force.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Nooo—!
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: Hey! What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And which squad are you from?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Jessica, Department of Equipment and Applied Technologies. Temporarily transferred to B.P.R.S's Liskarm Squad.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Oh, so you're that little princess I've heard so much about. An honor to meet you.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: We're under orders to trace the source of last night's unrest. Locals with heavy debt are our prime suspects, so that's where we're starting our investigation.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Does your list include a single mom with a child too?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Just following orders. Besides, even if she's innocent we still have to repossess her mortgaged property.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Repossess mortgaged property... So this is why the boss had that word with me?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Listen, I don't see what the boss has to do with this, but I do know you're hindering my work here.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't you realize that you're doing the exact same thing as those gangsters you arrested?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Orders, princess. Just following orders. Don't make me repeat myself.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Reporting. I've found the woman.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Sir... Please, I'm begging you...
attributes.name: Anxious Resident

attributes.content: Let that lady go!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: I—I said, let her go.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: We're not the same as you, princess. We need these paychecks to eat.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Paychecks... paychecks!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Is your paycheck—No, no! I mean, I'm saying...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I... I can pay you!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What's this now? Bribery? Raythean's little lady is actually trying to bribe me?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Yes, I'm just a stupid little rich girl who throws money at all her problems, okay?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Guess there's no need for professional integrity when you've got a family like that at your back. But me? I can only trade my conscience for cash at Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm glad you're so self aware, but it really doesn't matter. Just stop making things difficult for us lowly peasants.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: If you've got money to burn, why not head on over to the bank and pay off all their debts?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Easy there, princess. Take your finger off the trigger, yeah? I know you lost your head for a bit there, but we still have to act according to our stations.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Wh-What?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica lowers her head to find that at some point, her hand had moved to her holster.
When she sees what is probably an expression of both wariness and disdain on the mercenary's face, she ends up swallowing her apology as she turns around and runs towards the bank.
